mapper.select: select id,title,view_cnt,updated_date,user_id,ifnull(ppid,id) from posts order by ppid desc, id asc
mapper.insert: insert into posts (id, title, content, view_cnt, created_date, updated_date, user_id, ppid) values (#{id},#{title},#{content},#{view_cnt},#{created_date},#{updated_date},#{user_id},#{ppid})
mapper.delete: delete from posts where id = #{id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.update: update posts set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_date = #{updated_date} where id = #{id} and user_id = #{user_id}
update posts set view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 where id = #{id}
update posts set comment_cnt = comment_cnt + #{cnt} where id = #{id}

choose.otherwise: and (title like concat ('%',#{keyword}, '%') or content like concat ('%',#{keyword}, '%'))
